title: Does not work
comment: Is it too much to hope for,  to find an app that actually works?  All I'd  like  is  the ability to split the cell phone bill among 3 parties, & not be forced to split evenly.  I want it as a recurring monthly expense,  not as a lending /borrowing arrangement.  Sounds simple enough.  But  it can't be found.

At this time the calculators do not have this feature. This can be done manually using the "Expenses" tab and by creating 3 "Mates" and 3 expense objects. If you have anymore questions please contact support@mattieapps.com. Please rerate if this helps you. We hope you will give RoomMates another chance. Edit: A feature request has been created.
I really like the tip calculator it has saved me on a few occasions

title: Great expense tracking
comment: I love the fact that I can add all the money my friends owe me!
Excellent Application and Perfect Build Quality
